text: Garth Ennis (born 16 January 1970) is a Northern Irish-American comics writer. He is best known for Preacher, The Boys, Hellblazer, Marvel Comics' The Punisher and DC Comics' Hitman. He worked a lot with artist Steve Dillon. In 1998, he was awarded the Eisner Award for Best Writer. Ennis was born in Holywood, County Down. He is an atheist. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:American atheists Category:American comics writers Category:British atheists Category:Writers from Northern Ireland Category:People from County Down
title: Garth Ennis
